attributes.action: Make instant action on global warming.
attributes.background: I want to government to really step up and take responsibility for this country and the earth they stand on. Global warming is affecting us and the government play a key role, even a few bans and helping out with recycling can save our planet for a long time.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what specific action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. If there is a specific policy that you would like the Government or Parliament to introduce, you could start a new petition calling for that.

There are already some other petition calling for specific action relating to global warming that you might want to consider supporting such as https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/130496
